author: scheu
msg: AXIS2-3417
Contributor:Rich Scheuerle
Added shortcut code to the JAXWS Block implementation to get the business object
from the DataSource.
For example, if the OMElement has a backing JAXBDataSource, then the JAXBBlock can
retrieve the JAXB object (and JAXBContext) directly from the data source.
I also added a unit test to BlockTests.java to verify the new code.

author: nigel
msg: HADOOP-2523. Fix TestDFSShell.testFilePermissions on Windows. Contributed by Raghu Angadi.

author: akarasulu
msg: Making DefaultDirectoryService throw unchecked IllegalStateException instead of
a checked NamingException because of the following two reasons which have just
been discussed on the mailing list:
o The checked NamingException is a PITA to deal with in terms of the try/catch
blocks the user has to deal with all over.
o The NamingException never really happens unless something is severely broken
with the build or the packaging is corrupted making the bootstrap schema not
load.  So there is no reason why we should not wrap this exception in an
IllegalStateException.
